title: Looking for Cincinnati n172 & n173 Old Judge all poses - Offering Trades and Cash
author: timkb

posts.post_title: Looking for Cincinnati n172 & n173 Old Judge all poses - Offering Trades and Cash
posts.post_content:
I am a Cincinnati collector looking for the n172 & n173 Cincinnati players in all poses. Offering trade for the attached Old Judge extras I have. Also willing to pay cash in addition.

All offers welcome - message me!


Bill Watkins - Kansas Citys
Jim Powell - Sioux Citys
John Barnes - St Pauls
Tom Loftus - Cleveland
Jim Mutrie - New Yorks
